### Books

* [Introduction to Data Science: Data Analysis and Prediction Algorithms with R](https://rafalab.github.io/dsbook/) (Rafael A. Irizarry)
* [Modern Data Science with R](https://beanumber.github.io/mdsr2e/) (Benjamin S. Baumer, Daniel T. Kaplan, and Nicholas J. Horton)
* [R for Data Science: Import, Tidy, Transform, Visualize, and Model Data](https://r4ds.had.co.nz) (Hadley Wickham and Garrett Grolemund)
* [The Art of Machine Learning](http://heather.cs.ucdavis.edu/artofml/draft.pdf) (Norm Matloff)
* [From Linear Models to Machine Learning](http://heather.cs.ucdavis.edu/draftregclass.pdf)
* [Mathematical Foundations for Data Analysis](https://mathfordata.github.io/) (Jeff M. Phillips)
* [Probabilistic Machine Learning](https://probml.github.io/pml-book/) (Kevin Murphy)
* [Tidy Modeling with R](https://www.tmwr.org/) (Max Kuhn and Julia Silge)

* [The Analysis of Biological Data](https://whitlockschluter3e.zoology.ubc.ca/index.html) (Michael Whitlock and Dolph Schluter)
